name: Turtwig
flavorText: The shell on its back is made of soil. On a very healthy Turtwig, the shell should feel moist.
Attack1Text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Grotle
flavorText: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokemon there on its back.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Torterra
flavorText: Some Pokemon are born on a Torterra's back and spend their entire life there.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Combee
flavorText: This Pokemon is a set of three. When they sleep, they gather up and form a giant hive of 100 Combee.
Attack1Text: Shuffle this Pokemon and all cards attached to it into your deck.

name: Vespiquen
flavorText: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for as many Combee as you like and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage times the number of damage counters on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Cherubi
flavorText: The small ball is not only filled with nutrients, it is also tasty. Starly try to peck it off.
Attack1Text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Cherrim
flavorText: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun's rays with its whole body.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may heal 20 damage from 1 of your Pokemon that has any Grass Energy attached to it.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Sewaddle
flavorText: Since this Pokemon makes its own clothes out of leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.

name: Swadloon
flavorText: Preferring dark, damp places, it spends the entire day eating fallen leaves that lie around it.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Leavanny
flavorText: Upon finding a small Pokemon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, discard all Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Maractus
flavorText: When it moves rhythmically, it makes a sound similar to maracas, making the surprised Pokemon flee.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Foongus
flavorText: It lures Pokemon with its pattern that looks just like a Poke Ball then releases poison spores.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into his or her deck.

name: Amoonguss
flavorText: It moves the caps on both arms and does a dance to lure prey. It prefers damp places.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into his or her deck.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a Special Condition. The Defending Pokemon is now affected by that Special Condition.

name: Moltres-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has any Plasma Energy attached to it, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Chimchar
flavorText: It is very agile. Before going to sleep, it extinguishes the flame on its tail to prevent fires.

name: Monferno
flavorText: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.
Attack1Text: Your opponent Switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Infernape
flavorText: It uses unique fighting moves with fire on its hand and feet. It will take on any opponent.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attack. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Victini-EX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for 2 basic Energy cards and attach them to your Benched Pokemon in any way you like. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is a Pokemon-EX, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Pansear
flavorText: Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

name: Simisear
flavorText: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: Does 20 more damage for each Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Litwick
flavorText: Its flame is usually out, but it starts shining when it absorbs life force from people or Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Lampent
flavorText: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon has no Energy attached to it, this Pokemon has no Retreat Cost.

name: Heatmor
flavorText: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.
Attack1Text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with the Defending Pokemon. The new Defending Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: Discard the top 4 cards of your deck. This attack does 50 damage times the number of Fire Energy cards discarded.

name: Squirtle
flavorText: It shelters itself in its shell, then strikes back with spouts of water at every opportunity.

name: Articuno-EX
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has any Plasma Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Swinub
flavorText: Rooting the tip of its snout into the ground, it searches for food. Sometimes, it even digs up a hot spring.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Piloswine
flavorText: With its excellent sense of smell, it's even able to find mushrooms that are buried under frozen ground.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip 5 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

name: Mamoswine
flavorText: When the temperature rose at the end of the ice age, most Mamoswine disappeared.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 90 damage times the number of heads.

name: Lotad
flavorText: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokemon that can't swim.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Lombre
flavorText: It has a mischievous spirit. If it spots an angler, it will tug on the fishing line to interfere.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Ludicolo
flavorText: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can't help breaking out into a dance.
Ability1Text: At any times between turns, heal 20 damage from this Pokemon.
Attack1Text: You may discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon. If you do, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Carvanha
flavorText: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.

name: Sharpedo
flavorText: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokemon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Manaphy
flavorText: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokemon.
Ability1Text: When this Pokemon is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, attach a Water Energy card from your discard pile to your Benched Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Vanillite
flavorText: Theoretically, this Pokemon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. Their breath is -58Â° F.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Vanillish
flavorText: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.

name: Vanilluxe
flavorText: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.
Attack1Text: Attach 2 basic Energy cards from your hand to 1 of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Frillish
flavorText: If its veil-like arms stun and wrap a foe, that foe will be dragged miles below the surface, never to return.
Attack1Text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Jellicent
flavorText: Its body is mostly seawater. It's said there's a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon and is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, the Attacking Pokemon is now Confused and Poisoned.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Cubchoo
flavorText: Their snot is a barometer of health. When healthy, their snot is sticky and the power of their ice moves increases.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Beartic
flavorText: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways around the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage times the number of damage counters on this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

name: Magnemite
flavorText: The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which allows it to float.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Magnemite
flavorText: The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which allows it to float.

name: Magneton
flavorText: The stronger electromagnetic waves from the three linked Magnemite are enough to dry out surrounding moisture.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Magneton
flavorText: The stronger electromagnetic waves from the three linked Magnemite are enough to dry out surrounding moisture.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Magnezone
flavorText: Sometimes the magnetism emitted by Magnezone is too strong, making them attract each other so they cannot move.
Ability1Text: During your turn, you may play 2 Supporter cards.
Attack1Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon. Then, your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Magnezone
flavorText: Sometimes the magnetism emitted by Magnezone is too strong, making them attract each other so they cannot move.
Attack1Text: Attach 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Zapdos-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has any Plasma Energy attached to it, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Rotom
flavorText: Its electric-like body can enter some kinds of machines and take control in order to make mischief.
Attack1Text: Discard a Lightning Energy card from your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards.
Attack2Text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. This attack does 20 damage times the number of Trainer cards in your opponent's hand.

name: Joltik
flavorText: Since it can't generate its own electricity, it sticks onto large-bodied Pokemon and absorbs static electricity.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Galvantula
flavorText: It creates barriers from electrified silk that stun foes. This works as a weapon as well as a defense.
Attack1Text: Discard all Lightning Energy attached to this Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Zubat
flavorText: It does not need eyes, because it emits ultrasonic waves to check its surrounding while it flies.
Attack1Text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Zubat
flavorText: It does not need eyes, because it emits ultrasonic waves to check its surrounding while it flies.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon has no Energy attached to it, this Pokemon has no Retreat Cost.

name: Golbat
flavorText: Flitting around in the dead of night, it sinks its fangs into its prey and drains a nearly fatal amount of blood.
Attack1Text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Crobat
flavorText: Having four wings allows it to fly more quickly and quietly so it can sneak up on prey without its noticing.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Put 4 damage counters instead of 1 on this Pokemon between turns.

name: Koffing
flavorText: Toxic gas is held within its thin, balloon-shaped body, so it can cause massive explosions.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Koffing
flavorText: Toxic gas is held within its thin, balloon-shaped body, so it can cause massive explosions.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Weezing
flavorText: Inhaling toxic fumes from trash and mixing them inside its body lets it spread an even fouler stench.
Ability1Text: When this Pokemon is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, discard the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Ralts
flavorText: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokemon, its body warms up slightly.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Kirlia
flavorText: If its Trainer becomes happy, it overflows with energy, dancing joyously while spinning about.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Gallade
flavorText: When trying to protect someone, it extends its elbows as if they were swords and fights savagely.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to all of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Giratina
flavorText: It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 50 more damage.
Attack2Text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

name: Trubbish
flavorText: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokemon Tool card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Trubbish
flavorText: Wanting more garbage, they follow people who litter. They always belch poison gas.

name: Trubbish
flavorText: Wanting more garbage, they follow people who litter. They always belch poison gas.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage for each Pokemon Tool card attached to Pokemon in play (both yours and your opponent's).

name: Garbodor
flavorText: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to that Pokemon.

name: Garbodor
flavorText: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage times the number of Colorless in the Defending Pokemon's Retreat Cost.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage times the number of heads.

name: Elgyem
flavorText: Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO crash site in the desert 50 years ago.

name: Elgyem
flavorText: Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO crash site in the desert 50 years ago.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Beheeyem
flavorText: Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three fingers, but those patterns haven't been decoded.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Move 6 damage counters from any of your Pokemon to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Phanpy
flavorText: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.

name: Donphan
flavorText: It attacks by curling up, then rolling into its foe. It can blow apart a house in one hit.
Attack1Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 60 more damage. Discard the Stadium card.

name: Lunatone
flavorText: The phase of the moon apparently has some effect on its power. It's active on the night of a full moon.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck and put them back on top of your deck in any order.

name: Solrock
flavorText: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. When it spins, its body shines.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 90 damage to itself.

name: Riolu
flavorText: It has the peculiar power of being able to see emotions such as joy and rage in the form of waves.

name: Riolu
flavorText: They communicate with one another using their auras made tangible by their emotions.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Lucario
flavorText: A well-trained one can sense auras to identify and take in the feelings of creatures over half a mile away.

name: Lucario
flavorText: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon has any Metal Energy attached to it, this Pokemon's type is both Fighting and Metal.
Attack1Text: Does 30 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

name: Timburr
flavorText: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Gurdurr
flavorText: With strengthened bodies, they skillfully wield steel beams to take down buildings.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Conkeldurr
flavorText: Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.
Attack1Text: If this Pokemon is Burned or Poisoned, this attack does 60 more damage.
Attack2Text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Purrloin
flavorText: Its cute act is a ruse. When victims let down their guard, they find their items taken. It attacks with sharp claws.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Purrloin
flavorText: Their cute act is a ruse. They trick people and steal their valuables just to see the looks on their faces.
Attack1Text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Liepard
flavorText: Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they have developed. They run silently in the night.
Attack1Text: Your opponent reveal his or her hand. Discard a Supporter card you find there. Use the effect of that card as the effect of this attack.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Scraggy
flavorText: Proud of its sturdy skull, it suddenly headbutts everything, but its weight makes it unstable, too.

name: Scrafty
flavorText: It pulls up its shed skin to protect itself while it kicks. The bigger the crest, the more respected it is.
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has a Pokemon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Skarmory
flavorText: Its heavy-looking iron body is actually thin and light, so it can fly at speeds over 180 mph.
Attack1Text: Discard a Team Plasma card from your hand. if you do, draw 3 cards.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Klink
flavorText: Two bodies comprise a fixed pair. They spin around each other to generate energy.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Klang
flavorText: A minigear and big gear comprises its body. If the minigear it launches at its foe doesn't return, it will die.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Klinklang
flavorText: The minigear spins at high speed. Then the energy from the red core charges the minigear to make it ready to fire.
Ability1Text: Prevent all damage done to your Metal Pokemon by attacks from your opponent's Pokemon-EX.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Durant
flavorText: Individuals each play different roles in driving Heatmor, their natural predator, away from their colony.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Durant
flavorText: Individuals each play different roles in driving Heatmor, their natural predator, away from their colony.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Pokemon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Cobalion-EX
Attack1Text: Discard a Special Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Druddigon
flavorText: It runs through the narrow tunnels formed by Excadrill and Onix. It uses its sharp claws to catch prey.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Black Kyurem-EX
Attack2Text: Discard 3 Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: White Kyurem-EX
Attack2Text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.

name: Clefairy
flavorText: On nights with a full moon, Clefairy gather from all over and dance. Bathing in moonlight makes them float.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Clefable
flavorText: Their ears are sensitive enough to hear a pin drop from over a mile away, so they're usually found in quiet places.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokemon and put it onto that Pokemon. (This counts as evolving that Pokemon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Doduo
flavorText: The brains in its two heads appear to communicate emotions to each other with telepathic power.
Attack1Text: Flip 5 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Dodrio
flavorText: When Doduo evolves into this odd breed, one of its heads splits into two. It runs at nearly 40 mph.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads. This Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Snorlax
flavorText: When its belly is full, it becomes too lethargic to even lift a finger, so it is safe to bounce on its belly.
Ability1Text: As long as this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, your opponent's Active Pokemon can't retreat.
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage times the number of Team Plasma Pokemon you have in play.

name: Togepi
flavorText: It transforms the kindness and joy of others into happiness, which it stores in its shell.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Togetic
flavorText: To share its happiness, it flies around the world seeking kind-hearted people.
Attack1Text: Your opponent draws a card.

name: Togekiss
flavorText: It shares many blessings with people who respect one another's rights and avoid needless strife.
Ability1Text: As long as this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, whenever your opponent plays an Item card from his or her hand, prevent all effects of that card done to your Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

name: Whismur
flavorText: Usually, its cries are like quiet murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks at the same volume as a jet plane.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

name: Loudred
flavorText: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Exploud
flavorText: Its howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.
Attack1Text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. Discard all Item cards you find there.
Attack2Text: Does 50 damage times the number of your Pokemon that have the Round attack.

name: Lugia-EX
Ability1Text: If your opponent's Pokemon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack of this Pokemon, take 1 more Prize card.
Attack1Text: Discard a Plasma Energy attached to this Pokemon. If you can't discard a Plasma Energy, this attack does nothing.

name: Skitty
flavorText: It shows its cute side by chasing its own tail until it gets dizzy.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Patrat
flavorText: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won't notice a foe coming from behind.
Attack1Text: This Pokemon does 10 damage to itself.

name: Patrat
flavorText: Extremely cautious, there is always one keeping watch, but they don't notice enemies coming from behind.
Attack1Text: Draw a card.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Watchog
flavorText: Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and body glow and stuns attacking opponents.
Attack1Text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Watchog
flavorText: Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and body glow and stuns attacking opponents.
Attack1Text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Bouffalant
flavorText: They are known to charge so wildly that if a train were to enter their territory, they would send it flying.
Attack1Text: Discard a Pokemon Tool card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Rufflet
flavorText: It stands up to massive opponents, not out of courage, but out of recklessness. But that is how it gets stronger.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Braviary
flavorText: The more scars they have, the more respect these brave soldiers of the sky get from their peers.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, you may have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack1Text: You may do 20 more damage. If you do, this Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.

name: Victini-EX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for 2 basic Energy cards and attach them to your Benched Pokemon in any way you like. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is a Pokemon-EX, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Articuno-EX
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has any Plasma Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Cobalion-EX
Attack1Text: Discard a Special Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Lugia-EX
Ability1Text: If your opponent's Pokemon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack of this Pokemon, take 1 more Prize card.
Attack1Text: Discard a Plasma Energy attached to this Pokemon. If you can't discard a Plasma Energy, this attack does nothing.

name: Charizard
flavorText: This extremely rare Pokemon is a different color than usual. It is very hard to find.
Attack1Text: This attack does 40 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Blastoise
flavorText: This extremely rare Pokemon is a different color than usual. It is very hard to find.
Ability1Text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Water Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Does 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokemon.
